TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityContextSource extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the source for the security context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SecurityContextSource enumeration is used to supply parameters for some assembly load methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.SecurityContextSource CurrentAppDomain = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The current application domain is the source for the security context.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.SecurityContextSource CurrentAssembly = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The current assembly is the source for the security context.
